import React, { useState } from 'react'; const initialUsers = [ { id: '1', username: 'admin', email: 'admin@example.com', full_name: 'Admin User', role: 'admin', is_active: true, last_login: '2024-06-01 10:00', created_at: '2024-05-01', updated_at: '2024-06-01', }, { id: '2', username: 'manager1', email: 'manager1@example.com', full_name: 'Manager One', role: 'manager', is_active: true, last_login: '2024-06-02 09:30', created_at: '2024-05-10', updated_at: '2024-06-02', }, ]; const roleOptions = ['admin', 'manager', 'cashier', 'inventory']; function Users() { const [users, setUsers] = useState(initialUsers); const [form, setForm] = useState({ username: '', email: '', password: '', full_name: '', role: 'cashier', is_active: true, }); const [showAdd, setShowAdd] = useState(false); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value, type, checked } = e.target; setForm((prev) => ({ ...prev, [name]: type === 'checkbox' ? checked : value, })); }; const handleAddUser = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (!form.username || !form.email || !form.password || !form.full_name) return; setUsers([ ...users, { id: Date.now().toString(), username: form.username, email: form.email, full_name: form.full_name, role: form.role, is_active: form.is_active, last_login: '', created_at: new Date().toISOString().slice(0, 10), updated_at: new Date().toISOString().slice(0, 10), }, ]); setForm({ username: '', email: '', password: '', full_name: '', role: 'cashier', is_active: true }); setShowAdd(false); }; return (

Manage users, roles, and access for your POS system.

{user.username} {user.email} {user.full_name} {user.role} {user.is_active ? 'Active' : 'Inactive'} {user.last_login || '-'} {user.created_at}
{/* Card layout for mobile (smaller than md) */}
{users.map((user) => (
{user.username}
{user.is_active ? 'Active' : 'Inactive'}
{user.email}
{user.full_name}
Role: {user.role}
Last Login: {user.last_login || '-'}
Created: {user.created_at}
))}
{/* Add User Modal */} {showAdd && (

Add New User

)}
); } export default Users;
